message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
Your offer was a bit too greedy, Alice. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 45/55 split.
I understand your point of view, Bob, but I need to look out for myself too. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer or leave it, it's the same as your first one!
